title: FIFA World Cup : players with most matches 1930 to 2018
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Player, and Number of appearances in each Player on the y axis.
Player Lothar Matthäus (Germany) has the highest Number of appearances and Cafu (Brazil) has the lowest Number of appearances.
The minimum Player Cafu (Brazil) has got 1.25 times less Number of appearances than the maximum Player Lothar Matthäus (Germany).
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Player in the x axis and Number of appearances in the y axis.
Player Lothar Matthäus (Germany) has the highest Number of appearances and Cafu (Brazil) has the lowest Number of appearances.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Player in the x axis and Number of appearances in the y axis.
Player Lothar Matthäus (Germany) has the highest Number of appearances and Cafu (Brazil) has the lowest Number of appearances.
Player Miroslav Klose (Germany) has the second highest value for Number of appearances.
The highest Player Lothar Matthäus (Germany) has 5.0 more Number of appearances than the lowest Player Cafu (Brazil).
Number of appearances at Player Lothar Matthäus (Germany) is 25.0 , second place is Miroslav Klose (Germany) at 24.0, and thirdly is Paolo Maldini (Italy) at 23.0.
Player Cafu (Brazil), Bastian Schweinsteiger (Germany), Philipp Lahm (Germany), and Grzegorz Lato (Poland) share the same value 20.0.
The lowest value 20.0 at Cafu (Brazil) is almost 1.16 times smaller than the average value 21.5.
Summing up the values of all Players, we get total 215.0.
